Example of journal’s templates

Source: vignettes/articles/examples_linear.Rmd
examples_linear.Rmd

The examples below illustrate all the article’s template included into this package.

acm - Association for Computing Machinery

output: acm_article

Source

acs - American Chemical Society

output: acs_article

Source

aea - American Economics Association journals

output: aea_article

Source

agu - American Geophysical Union (AGU) Article Template

output: agu_article

Source

amq - Bulletin AMQ Article

output: amq_article

Source

ams - American Meteorological Society

output: ams_article

Source

arxiv - arXiv Preprint

output: arxiv_article

Source

asa - ASA Journal Article

output: asa_article

Source

bioinformatics - Bioinformatics Journal Article

output: bioinformatics_article

Source

biometrics - Biometrics Journal Article

output: biometrics_article

Source

copernicus - Copernicus Journal Article

output: copernicus_article

Source

elsevier - Elsevier Journal Article

output: elsevier_article

Source

frontiers - Frontiers Journal Article

output: frontiers_article

Source

ieee - IEEE Transactions Journal Article

output: ieee_article

Source

ims - Institute of Mathematical Statistics

output: ims_article

Source

jasa - JASA Article

output: jasa_article

Source

joss - Journal of Open Source Software Article

output: joss_article

Source

jss - Journal of Statistical Software

output: jss_article

Source

lipics - LIPIcs Article

output: lipics_article

Source

mdpi - MDPI Journal Article

output: mdpi_article

Source

mnras - Monthly Notices of Royal Astronomical Society

output: mnras_article

Source

oup - Oxford University Press (OUP) Template

output: oup_article

Source

pihph - Papers in Historical Phonology Article (PiHPh)

output: pihph_article

Source

plos - PLOS Journal Article

output: plos_article

Source

pnas - PNAS Journal Article

output: pnas_article

Source

rjournal - R Journal Submission

output: rjournal_article

Source

rsos - Royal Society Open Science Journal Article

output: rsos_article

Source

rss - Royal Statistical Society

output: rss_article

Source

sage - Sage Journals Article Template

output: sage_article

Source

sim - Statistics in Medicine Article

output: sim_article

Source

springer - Springer Journal Article

output: springer_article

Source

tf - Taylor & Francis Journal Article

output: tf_article

Source

Contents

rticles is built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.rstudio.com.

Developed by JJ Allaire, Yihui Xie, R Foundation, Hadley Wickham, Journal of Statistical Software, Ramnath Vaidyanathan, Association for Computing Machinery, Carl Boettiger, Elsevier, Karl Broman, Kirill Mueller, Bastiaan Quast, Randall Pruim, Ben Marwick, Charlotte Wickham, Oliver Keyes, Miao Yu, Daniel Emaasit, Thierry Onkelinx, Alessandro Gasparini, Marc-Andre Desautels, Dominik Leutnant, MDPI, Taylor and Francis, Oğuzhan Öğreden, Dalton Hance, Daniel Nüst, Petter Uvesten, Elio Campitelli, John Muschelli, Alex Hayes, Zhian N. Kamvar, Noam Ross, Robrecht Cannoodt, Duncan Luguern, David M. Kaplan, Sebastian Kreutzer, Shixiang Wang, Jay Hesselberth, Christophe Dervieux. Site built with pkgdown.
